classes

Class PromotionPackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.MenuItem
      • classes.PromotionPackage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PromotionPackage
extends MenuItem
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a promotion package offered by the restaurant. A promotion package comprises of multiple food item which are charged for cheaper price.
    Since:
    2016-24-10
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    stella
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addFood

        public void addFood(java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> foodMenu)
        Allows user to select a food item from a printed list of choice to be added to the promotion package. Only a food instance can added to the promotion package.
        Parameters:
        foodMenu - Arraylist of menu item for user to select a food item from

      • removeFood

        Remove a food from the promotion package
        Parameters:
        food - Food item to be removed from the promotion package
